name: Roman Relic Hunter
description:
In a random forest somewhere, you stumble upon some ancient ruins. It's a good thing you have your trust metal detector handy!

Roman Relic Hunter is a casual game where the goal is to find and unearth as many ancient relics as you can. There is no 'winning' or 'losing', simply go at your own pace and with the help of your companion discover the hidden treasures of the Romans. This game was made as an entry for the Roman Mytholojam 2018 by one person.
